summary: An ancient sanctuary used by each Dovahhkiin throughout the generations.  Built long ago by Dwemer to show their appreciation toward their era\'s Dovahkiin for doing what technology could not.  Not much else is known about the name of this dragonborn or how he helped that era.
descriptionHtml:
An ancient sanctuary used by each Dovahhkiin throughout the generations.  Built long ago by Dwemer to show their appreciation toward their era\'s Dovahkiin for doing what technology could not.  Not much else is known about the name of this dragonborn or how he helped that era.  (until I figure it out myself for a quest)


[color=#ffbd5d][size=4][b]2.0+ are on a completely different mod file!  DO NOT upgrade without making a clean save prior or without packing your bags!  Your stuff will not be moved automatically! [/b][/size][/color]

[color=#ffbd5d][size=2][b]Video reflects v1.6[/b][/size][/color]
[youtube]kXc6Q2gDCGk[/youtube]


[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]Includes[/b]:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*]Bedroom with Library and Reading Area with Day/Night lighting
[*]Crafting Areas with all your needs and storage
[*]Bar/Dining and Kitchen
[*]Treasure Vault
[*]Garden Cavern
[*]Prayer Room with Cleansed Soul bonus
[*]Bathroom with Cleansed Body bonus
[*]Throne Room with mask mounts, mannequins, display cases, wall mounts and weapon racks.
[*]NPC Merchants
[*]Auto Sorting Portal
[*]Sparring Practice with 15 possible opponents (leveled)
[*]
[*]1056 Book Slots
[*]So many containers I lost count
[*]22 Display Cases
[*]42 Wall Mount Slots - Weapon and Shield mounts.
[*]55 Weapon Rack Slots
[*]12 Mannequins
[*]9 Mask Mounts
[/list]

* Take note that nothing will respawn, except the Trash Can (next to sorting portal).  NPCs can be killed... don\'t leave the trap door open in the throne room.

[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]New to v2.0-2.3[/b]:[/size][/color]
[list]
[*]New Exterior that needs discovered again
[*]Top and bottom floors are now two different cells to combat FPS issue
[*]Added Sorting Portal -- Works on everything important but SoulGems and is mod item friendly
[*]Added Bathroom and extra living quarters for follower \'storage\'
[*]Expanded prayer room and treasure room
[*]Streamlined throne room layout for better FPS, lighting and feel.
[*]Removed quest related areas until they are ready (temple area is completely gone)
[*]NPCs have more daily activities
[*]Day/Night lighting fixed -- for real this... third time.
[*]
[*]Added praying and showering bonus (sit in prayer room or stay in the shower for 10 seconds)
[*]Fixed exterior navmesh (again)
[*]
[*]Fixed scripting issues
[*]Added Sparring Practice
[/list]

[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]Sorting Portal[/b]:[/size][/color]
You\'ll notice the statue upstairs in the bedroom hall.  For the portal to work you must pick up the notes in the box next to the statue and place them in a container.  The notes must be in a container for that item to get sorted.  The \"Catch All\" note marker will catch any object that didn\'t get sorted.  And, as stated,  Soul Gems don\'t get sorted properly and will always go to the Catch All or be given back to you.  There also seems to be a bug with the Tools, like lockpicks, being sent to the shield container, even though the script says otherwise.


[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]Sparring Practice[/b]:[/size][/color]
Enter the sparring room and press the button on the wall (in the pit).  The doors will lock and you will have to defeat 5 randomly chosen opponents based on your level.  You can hit the button again to quit.  Sparring practice can only happen once a day -- takes 24 hours to recharge.

You can quit practice by hitting the button again.

Winning will get you a [s]mild Melee Attack bonus[/s]... scratch that... I forgot to change it from the Ranged reward that\'s meant for the unreleased archery practice.  Woops.

-- the animation timing on spawning is a bit off but you shouldn\'t hit any other bugs


[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]Shower & Prayer Bonuses[/b]:[/size][/color]
Stand in the bathrooms shower area or sit in the prayer room for 10 seconds and get a 10% stamina or magica regen bonus that will last for 12 hours.




[color=#ffbd5d][size=3][b]Modders Wanted[/b]:[/size][/color]
Check this mods forums for info if you are looking for a Quest project.
author: Dankicity

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v0_9
files.changelogHtml: Updated mask busts to not respawn

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_0
files.changelogHtml:
Misc minor tweaks and prep for quests.
Hall lighting.
Swapped out NPCs for cloned essentials ~ since some people killed them and they wouldn\'t return.
Added container inside the entrance that will get scripted later on ~ auto organizer.
Added a \"trash\" satchel in the basket opposite side from new container that will respawn.

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed bed to be player owned ~ gives \"Well Rested\" perk
Added the garden spa ~ lower doors but might move to upper doors later.
Navmesh tweaks
Fog and lighting tweaks

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added lift system ~ Goes to Top Entrance, Bedroom, Throne Room and Entrance Hall
Misc changes to fit lifts ~ top exterior mostly
Added the Entrance Hall for the lower entrance route

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed top lift option for throne room
Added emergency hatch incase lift bugs out.
Tweaks to throne room and room for dynamic mannequins.
Beds now, for real this time, give well rested bonus.

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_4
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed throne chair
Using lift to Skyrim now autosaves
Redesigned Bedroom
Added 4 more shield mounts to throne room
Added satchel to prayer room.
Reoptimized Rooms and Portals
Numerous exterior tweaks
Added map flag next to throne ~ with a crown (jagged crown model for now)
Spaced out display cases and mounts
Replaced basket and respawning satchel with a single Trash Can basket container

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Added day/night lighting to bedroom
Redesigned throne room
Added 12 single weapon wall mounts

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_6
files.changelogHtml:
Flattened everything out into two floors
Replaced hallways with lifts
Added 1st floor general room
Added 2nd floor dining room/bar
Old bar is a dedicated kitchen
Added treasury \'vault\'
Added 4 new merchant NPCs
Tweaked bedroom design with more night lighting
Tweaked external appearance (fx, light, overgrowth)
Tweaked lighting and new shadow casters

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_7
files.changelogHtml:
Quick Fix for the Skyrim 1.5 Patch
Completely new exterior
Added Chopping block to forge area
Removed lift options in favor of an NPC friendly lift and door (however ironic that is right now)
Misc other tweaks

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v1_8
files.changelogHtml:
Reverted the exterior back to v1.6 with navmesh ~ new look is for v2.0
Removed the misleading buttons in sparring area
Fixed night lights in bedroom when entering the house

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v2_0
files.changelogHtml:
New exterior -- need discovered again
Top and bottom floors now in different cells
Auto Sorting Portal -- Works for almost everything except soulgems
Alternate throne room, prayer room and treasure room layout as well as a new bathroom and extra living quarters
NPCs do more, nightlights fixed in bedroom, quest related areas removed (the temple part)

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v2_1
files.changelogHtml:
Added bathroom and prayer room bonuses
Fixed exterior navmesh
Tweaked lighting to be more consistant
Cleaned mod file

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v2_2
files.changelogHtml: Fixed navmesh at lift for followers/NPCs

files.name: Dovahkiin Temple - Sanctuary v2_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed script issues of 2.2
Added Sparring Practice
